downloadTitle: Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015
downloadDescription: Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 enables integration between Team Foundation Server and Project Server. These extensions are similar to the SharePoint Extensions for Team Foundation Server 2013 and need to be installed on all of the front end servers in your SharePoint farm that is supporting Project Server 2013.
detailsSection: Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 enables integration between Visual Studio Team Foundation Server 2015 and Project Server 2013. These extensions are similar to the SharePoint Extensions for Team Foundation Server 2013 and need to be installed on all of the front end servers in your SharePoint farm that is supporting Project Server 2013. Visual Studio Team Foundation Server Extensions for Project Server 2015 enable teams to create Enterprise Project Plans in Project Server 2013 and syncing data between it and Team Projects in Team Foundation Server 2015. To find out what's new in Team Foundation Server 2015, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Team Foundation Server 2015 KB Article.
systemRequirementsSection:
For additional information on Operating System support, see the Visual Studio 2015 Compatibility page. Hardware Requirements:
  • 2.2 GHz or faster processor
  • 1 GB or more of RAM
  • 1 GB or more of available hard disk space
installInstructionSection:
To download an image to burn on a DVD:
  • On this page, choose the Download button.
  • Select the .iso option and then choose the Next button.
    • Choose the Save button to download a DVD5 ISO image so that you can burn a DVD later.
      • After downloading the ISO file, you should use the File Checksum Integrity Verifier tool to calculate and verify that the SHA-1 value for this file matches the value listed on the Visual Studio 2015 ISO Files SHA-1 Values page.
